Payroll_Payee_FICA_Data.description: Set to True when FICA changes are for all positions - no position should be provided.

We include a new Apply to Worker attribute for Exempt status from FICA OASDI and FICA Medicare. When the Apply to Worker check box is not selected, Position is required.' Web services will fail if Position is not included.

description: Contains all the Payroll Payee FICA Medicare Tax Election data

validation.validation: Please provide a Worker or Position.  Both cannot be empty.
validation.description: Please provide a Worker or Position.  Both cannot be empty.

validation.validation: The Position [position] doesn't have a Worker through employment as of this date: [date]
validation.description: The Position doesn't have a Worker through employment Effective as of date.

validation.validation: Only one can be selected: Position, All Positions or Apply to Worker.
validation.description: Either Position or All Position Or ATW can be selected. Not all three can be selected and also the following combinations are Not allowed: (Position or ATW) or Not (All position Or ATW).

validation.validation: OASDI Exempt is required when Apply to Worker is set to true.
validation.description: Validating the condition when the Apply to worker is provided and  OASDI Exempt is not provided.

validation.validation: OASDI Exempt Reason is required when Apply To Worker is set to true.
validation.description: Validating the condition when the Apply to worker is provided and  OASDI Exempt reason is not provided.

validation.validation: Medicare Exempt is required when Apply To Worker is set to true.
validation.description: Validating the condition when the Apply to worker is provided and Medicare  Exempt is not provided.

validation.validation: Medicare Exempt Reason is required when Apply To Worker is set to true.
validation.description: Validating the condition when the Apply to worker is provided and Medicare  Exempt reason is not provided.

validation.validation: The position specified is not a valid US position based on the effective date.
OASDI exempt is required when the OASDI exempt reason is provided.
validation.description: Validating the error condition when the  Exempt is provided and the reason for that is empty.

validation.validation: The Medicare exempt reason is required.
validation.description: Validating the error condition when the  Exempt is provided and the reason for that is empty.

validation.validation: Medicare exempt is required when the Medicare exempt reason is provided.
validation.description: Validating the condition when the exempt reason is provided and the exempt is set to false.

validation.validation: The OASDI exempt reason is required.
validation.description: Validating the error condition when the  Exempt is provided and the reason for that is empty.

validation.validation: OASDI data or Medicare data is required.
This Reference ID is already in use by another FICA tax election.
You can't change the Effective As Of date for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current Effective As Of date for this tax election.
You can't include OASDI Exempt Data when editing an existing Medicare tax election.
You can't change the worker for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current worker for this tax election.
You can't include Medicare Exempt Data when editing an existing OASDI tax election.
Select either OASDI Exempt Data or Medicare Exempt Data. Only 1 is allowed.
